name: time etc
tagline: Uber talented people, by the hour
description: Unleash your true potential with a talented Virtual Assistant. A Virtual Assistant will take care of your to-do list leaving you to do more of what you love. They can do anything an Executive Assistant can do plus marketing, research and writing too. Led by Sir Richard Branson's former executive assistant, we're the secret weapon of thousands of high achieving people in Google, Facebook and more. Our service is available worldwide with Virtual Assistants in the U.S. and UK.
